title: PM warns ‘tough action’ against people fanning sectarianism
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 31 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday thanked the nation on peaceful observing of Ashura, however warned “tough action” against those fanning sectarianism.
“I want to thank our nation for the peaceful observing of Ashura in the country…Unfortunately, information has come to me of elements who tried to ignite flames of sectarianism on this occasion,” the Prime Minister tweeted.
Prime Minister @ImranKhanPTI's thanked the nation for a peaceful observance of Ashura. He also said that strict action will be taken against those who tried to stoke sectarianism on this occasion: @PakPMO #APPNews #Ashura pic.twitter.com/O5wNiBspXt
— APP   (@appcsocialmedia) August 31, 2020
The Prime Minister warned that strict action would be taken against those involved in spreading hate among different sects.
“I will be taking very tough action against them,” he said.
